queryMap.query: -- 재고현황 조회 SELECT /* tbef_parts_lack_ff001 */ ROWNUM AS NUM , NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS MODULE_GUBUN , NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS PARTS_TPE , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','합계',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'B','보트계','M','모터계','T','공구계','W','소모품계','T','공구계',MODULE_GUBUN)),PARTS_CD) AS PARTS_CD , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'M','','T','','W','','B','',MODULE_GUBUN)),PARTS_YEAR) AS PARTS_YEAR , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',CNT||' 품목',PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',SPEC) AS SPEC , SAFT_UNIT_CNT , NOW_UNIT_CNT , LACK_UNIT_CNT FROM ( SELECT MODULE_GUBUN -- 식별구분 , PARTS_CD -- 부품코드 , PARTS_YEAR -- 부품년식 , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN SAFT_UNIT_CNT>0 OR NOW_UNIT_CNT>0 THEN PARTS_CD ELSE NULL END) AS CNT -- 품번종류 수 , MAX(PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM -- 품명 , MAX(SPEC) AS SPEC -- 규격 , SUM(SAFT_UNIT_CNT) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT -- 안전재고 , SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT -- 현재재고 , SUM(LACK_UNIT_CNT) AS LACK_UNIT_CNT -- 과부족 FROM ( SELECT TPM.STND_YEAR , TPM.MBR_CD , TPM.PARTS_CD , TPM.PARTS_TPE AS MODULE_GUBUN , TPM.PARTS_YEAR , TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , TPM.SPEC , SUM(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT -- 안전재고 , SUM(TPM.CRFW_UNIT_CNT) AS CRFW_UNIT_CNT -- 이월재고 , SUM(TPM.NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT -- 현재재고 , SUM(TPM.NOW_UNIT_CNT) - SUM(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT) LACK_UNIT_CNT -- 과부족 FROM ( SELECT TP.STND_YEAR , TP.MBR_CD , TPM.PARTS_CD , TPM.PARTS_TPE , TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , TPM.SPEC , NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) SAFT_UNIT_CNT , TP.PARTS_YEAR , NVL(CRFW_UNIT_CNT,0) CRFW_UNIT_CNT , NVL(NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) NOW_UNIT_CNT , NVL(SIGHT_CNT,0) SIGHT_CNT FROM TBEF_PARTS_MASTER TPM , TBEF_PARTS TP WHERE TPM.PARTS_CD = TP.PARTS_CD(+) AND TPM.PARTS_YEAR = TP.PARTS_YEAR(+) AND TP.STND_YEAR(+) = ? AND TP.MBR_CD(+) = ? AND TPM.PARTS_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DECODE(?, 'P', 1, 0) = SIGN(ASCII('W')-ASCII(TPM.PARTS_TPE)) )TPM GROUP BY TPM.STND_YEAR , TPM.MBR_CD , TPM.PARTS_CD , TPM.PARTS_TPE , TPM.PARTS_YEAR , TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , TPM.SPEC ) GROUP BY ROLLUP(MODULE_GUBUN, PARTS_CD, PARTS_YEAR) ORDER BY DECODE(NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A'),'B',1,'M',2,'T',3,'W',4,'A',8,9), PARTS_CD, PARTS_YEAR ) WHERE 1=1 AND (PARTS_CD IS NOT NULL AND PARTS_YEAR IS NOT NULL) OR (PARTS_CD IS NULL AND PARTS_YEAR IS NULL)

-- 재고현황 조회 SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS MODULE_GUBUN, NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS PARTS_TPE, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','합계',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'M','모터계','W','소모품계','T','공구계','보트계')),PARTS_CD) AS PARTS_CD, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','합계',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'M','','W','','T','','')),PARTS_YEAR) AS PARTS_YEAR, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',CNT||' 품목',PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',SPEC) AS SPEC, UNIT_PRICE, SAFT_UNIT_CNT, NOW_UNIT_CNT, LACK_UNIT_CNT, REQ_AMOUNT FROM( SELECT MODULE_GUBUN, -- 식별구분 PARTS_CD, -- 부품코드 PARTS_YEAR, -- 부품년식 COUNT(PARTS_CD) AS CNT, MAX(PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, -- 품명 MAX(SPEC) AS SPEC, -- 규격 SUM(SAFT_UNIT_CNT) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT, -- 안전재고 SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, -- 현재재고 SUM(LACK_UNIT_CNT) AS LACK_UNIT_CNT, --과부족 FROM ( SELECT TPM.STND_YEAR, TPM.MBR_CD, TPM.PARTS_CD, TPM.PARTS_TPE AS MODULE_GUBUN, TPM.PARTS_YEAR, TPM.PARTS_COM_CD, TPM.COM_NM, TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, TPM.SPEC NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT, -- 안전재고 NVL(TP.CRFW_UNIT_CNT,0) AS CRFW_UNIT_CNT, -- 이월재고 NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, -- 현재재고 NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) -NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) AS LACK_UNIT_CNT, -- 과부족 TPM.LOC, -- 보관장소 TPM.USE_YN -- 사용여부 FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ? AS STND_YEAR, -- 기준년도 ? AS MBR_CD, -- 경정장코드 TPM.PARTS_CD, PARTS_TPE, TPM.PARTS_COM_CD, COM_NM, PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, SPEC, SAFT_UNIT_CNT, LOC, USE_YN, UNIT_PRICE, PARTS_YEAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TPP.PARTS_CD ORDER BY TPP.PARTS_CD, TPP.PARTS_YEAR DESC) AS PARTS_SEQ FROM TBEF_PARTS_MASTER TPM, TBEF_PARTS_COM TPC WHERE TPM.PARTS_COM_CD = TPC.PARTS_COM_CD(+) AND TPM.PARTS_YEAR = TPC.PARTS_YEAR AND TPM.PARTS_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM LIKE ?||'%' --AND TPM.PARTS_COM_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.USE_YN = 'Y' ) WHERE PARTS_SEQ=1 )TPM, ( SELECT TP.STND_YEAR, TP.MBR_CD, TP.PARTS_CD, SUM(CRFW_UNIT_CNT)AS CRFW_UNIT_CNT, NVL(SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT),0) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, SUM(SIGHT_CNT) AS SIGHT_CNT FROM TBEF_PARTS TP WHERE TP.STND_YEAR = ? AND TP.MBR_CD = ? GROUP BY TP.STND_YEAR, TP.MBR_CD, TP.PARTS_CD ) TP WHERE TPM.STND_YEAR = TP.STND_YEAR(+) AND TPM.MBR_CD = TP.MBR_CD(+) AND TPM.PARTS_CD = TP.PARTS_CD(+) ORDER BY TPM.PARTS_CD ) GROUP BY ROLLUP(MODULE_GUBUN, PARTS_CD) ORDER BY NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') DESC, PARTS_CD ) WHERE AND (PARTS_CD IS NOT NULL AND PARTS_YEAR IS NOT NULL) OR (PARTS_CD IS NULL AND PARTS_YEAR IS NULL)

-- 미달품 재고현황 조회 SELECT /* tbef_parts_lack_ff002 */ ROWNUM AS NUM , NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS MODULE_GUBUN , NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS PARTS_TPE , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','합계',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'M','모터계','W','소모품계','T','공구계','보트계')),PARTS_CD) AS PARTS_CD , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','합계',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'M','','W','','T','','')),PARTS_YEAR) AS PARTS_YEAR , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',CNT||' 품목',PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',SPEC) AS SPEC , SAFT_UNIT_CNT , NOW_UNIT_CNT , LACK_UNIT_CNT FROM ( SELECT MODULE_GUBUN -- 식별구분 , PARTS_CD -- 부품코드 , PARTS_YEAR -- 부품년식 , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN SAFT_UNIT_CNT>0 OR NOW_UNIT_CNT>0 THEN PARTS_CD ELSE NULL END) AS CNT -- 품번종류 수 , MAX(PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM -- 품명 , MAX(SPEC) AS SPEC -- 규격 , SUM(SAFT_UNIT_CNT) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT -- 안전재고 , SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT -- 현재재고 , SUM(LACK_UNIT_CNT) AS LACK_UNIT_CNT -- 과부족 FROM ( SELECT TPM.STND_YEAR , TPM.MBR_CD , TPM.PARTS_CD , TPM.PARTS_TPE AS MODULE_GUBUN , TPM.PARTS_YEAR , TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , TPM.SPEC , SUM(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT -- 안전재고 , SUM(TPM.CRFW_UNIT_CNT) AS CRFW_UNIT_CNT -- 이월재고 , SUM(TPM.NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT -- 현재재고 , SUM(TPM.NOW_UNIT_CNT) - SUM(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT) LACK_UNIT_CNT -- 과부족 FROM ( SELECT TP.STND_YEAR , TP.MBR_CD , TPM.PARTS_CD , TPM.PARTS_TPE , TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , TPM.SPEC , NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) SAFT_UNIT_CNT , TP.PARTS_YEAR , NVL(CRFW_UNIT_CNT,0) CRFW_UNIT_CNT , NVL(NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) NOW_UNIT_CNT , NVL(SIGHT_CNT,0) SIGHT_CNT FROM TBEF_PARTS_MASTER TPM , TBEF_PARTS TP WHERE TPM.PARTS_CD = TP.PARTS_CD(+) AND TP.STND_YEAR(+) = ? AND TP.MBR_CD(+) = ? AND TPM.PARTS_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DECODE(?, 'P', 1, 0) = SIGN(ASCII('W')-ASCII(TPM.PARTS_TPE)) )TPM WHERE NVL(TPM.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) - NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) < 0 GROUP BY TPM.STND_YEAR , TPM.MBR_CD , TPM.PARTS_CD , TPM.PARTS_TPE , TPM.PARTS_YEAR , TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM , TPM.SPEC ) GROUP BY ROLLUP(MODULE_GUBUN, PARTS_CD, PARTS_YEAR) ORDER BY DECODE(NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A'),'B',1,'M',2,'T',3,'W',4,'A',8,9), PARTS_CD ) WHERE (PARTS_CD IS NOT NULL AND PARTS_YEAR IS NOT NULL) OR (PARTS_CD IS NULL AND PARTS_YEAR IS NULL)

-- 미달품 재고현황 조회 SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS MODULE_GUBUN, NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') AS PARTS_TPE, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'','합계',DECODE(MODULE_GUBUN,'M','모터계','W','소모품계','T','공구계','보트계')),PARTS_CD) AS PARTS_CD, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',CNT||' 품목',PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',SPEC) AS SPEC, UNIT_PRICE, SAFT_UNIT_CNT, NOW_UNIT_CNT, LACK_UNIT_CNT, REQ_AMOUNT FROM( SELECT MODULE_GUBUN, -- 식별구분 PARTS_CD, -- 부품코드 COUNT(PARTS_CD) AS CNT, MAX(PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, -- 품명 MAX(SPEC) AS SPEC, -- 규격 SUM(UNIT_PRICE) AS UNIT_PRICE, -- 단가 SUM(SAFT_UNIT_CNT) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT, -- 안전재고 SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, -- 현재재고 SUM(LACK_UNIT_CNT) AS LACK_UNIT_CNT, --과부족 SUM(REQ_AMOUNT) AS REQ_AMOUNT --소요금액 FROM ( SELECT TPM.STND_YEAR, TPM.MBR_CD, TPM.PARTS_CD, TPM.PARTS_TPE AS MODULE_GUBUN, TPM.PRICE_STND_YEAR, TPM.PARTS_COM_CD, TPM.COM_NM, TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, TPM.SPEC, TPM.UNIT_PRICE, NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) AS SAFT_UNIT_CNT, -- 안전재고 NVL(TP.CRFW_UNIT_CNT,0) AS CRFW_UNIT_CNT, -- 이월재고 NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, -- 현재재고 NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) -NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) AS LACK_UNIT_CNT, -- 과부족 CASE WHEN NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) - NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) <0 THEN (NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) - NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) )* UNIT_PRICE ELSE 0 END AS REQ_AMOUNT, -- 소요금액 TPM.LOC, -- 보관장소 TPM.USE_YN -- 사용여부 FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ? AS STND_YEAR, -- 기준년도 ? AS MBR_CD, -- 경정장코드 TPM.PARTS_CD, PARTS_TPE, TPM.PARTS_COM_CD, COM_NM, PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, SPEC, SAFT_UNIT_CNT, LOC, USE_YN, UNIT_PRICE, PRICE_STND_YEAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TPP.PARTS_CD ORDER BY TPP.PARTS_CD, TPP.PRICE_STND_YEAR DESC) AS PARTS_SEQ FROM TBEF_PARTS_MASTER TPM, TBEF_PARTS_COM TPC , TBEF_PARTS_PRICE TPP WHERE TPM.PARTS_COM_CD = TPC.PARTS_COM_CD(+) AND TPM.PARTS_CD = TPP.PARTS_CD AND TPM.PARTS_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.PARTS_COM_CD LIKE ?||'%' AND TPM.USE_YN = DECODE(?, NULL, TPM.USE_YN, ?) ) WHERE PARTS_SEQ=1 )TPM, ( SELECT TP.STND_YEAR, TP.MBR_CD, TP.PARTS_CD, SUM(CRFW_UNIT_CNT)AS CRFW_UNIT_CNT, NVL(SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT),0) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, SUM(SIGHT_CNT) AS SIGHT_CNT FROM TBEF_PARTS TP WHERE TP.STND_YEAR=? AND TP.MBR_CD=? GROUP BY TP.STND_YEAR, TP.MBR_CD, TP.PARTS_CD ) TP WHERE TPM.STND_YEAR = TP.STND_YEAR(+) AND TPM.MBR_CD = TP.MBR_CD(+) AND TPM.PARTS_CD = TP.PARTS_CD(+) AND NVL(TP.NOW_UNIT_CNT,0) - NVL(TPM.SAFT_UNIT_CNT,0) <0 ORDER BY TPM.PARTS_CD ) GROUP BY ROLLUP(MODULE_GUBUN, PARTS_CD) ORDER BY NVL(MODULE_GUBUN,'A') DESC, PARTS_CD )

-- 부품출납일보 조회 SELECT /* tbef_parts_lack_ff003 */ ROWNUM AS NUM, NVL(GUBUN,'A') GUBUN, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'',DECODE(NVL(GUBUN,'A'),'A','합계',DECODE(GUBUN,'M','모터계','B','보트계','T','공구계','소모품계')), PARTS_CD) AS PARTS_CD, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',PARTS_YEAR) AS PARTS_YEAR, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',SPEC) AS SPEC, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',ENT_DT) AS ENT_DT, ENT_CNT, DELV_CNT, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',RMK) AS RMK, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',OUT_ID) AS OUT_ID, DECODE(PARTS_CD,'','',RECEPT_ID) AS RECEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT C.PARTS_TPE AS GUBUN, -- 구분 B.PARTS_CD, -- 품번 B.PARTS_YEAR, -- 단가년도 MAX(PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM) AS PARTS_ITEM_CD_NM, -- 품명 MAX(SPEC) AS SPEC, -- 스펙 MAX(DECODE(B.PARTS_YEAR, A.PARTS_YEAR, ENT_DT)) AS ENT_DT, -- 입출고일 SUM(DECODE(B.PARTS_YEAR, A.PARTS_YEAR, ENT_CNT,0)) AS ENT_CNT, -- 입고량 SUM(DECODE(B.PARTS_YEAR, A.PARTS_YEAR, DELV_CNT,0)) AS DELV_CNT, -- 출고량 --AVG(DECODE(B.PARTS_YEAR, A.PARTS_YEAR, A.NOW_UNIT_CNT, B.NOW_UNIT_CNT)) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT,-- 현재고 AVG(B.NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT,-- 현재고 MAX(RMK) AS RMK, -- 반출내용 MAX(OUT_ID) AS OUT_ID, -- 반출자 MAX(RECEPT_ID) AS RECEPT_ID -- 수령자 FROM ( SELECT A.ENT_DT, -- 입출고일 A.PARTS_CD, -- 품번 A.PARTS_YEAR, SUM(ENT_CNT) AS ENT_CNT, -- 입고량 SUM(DELV_CNT) AS DELV_CNT, -- 출고량 --AVG(NOW_UNIT_CNT) AS NOW_UNIT_CNT, -- 현재고 MAX(RMK) AS RMK, -- 반출내용 MAX(OUT_ID) AS OUT_ID, -- 반출자 MAX(RECEPT_ID) AS RECEPT_ID -- 수령자 FROM ( --부품출납일보(입고) SELECT A.ENT_DT, B.PARTS_CD, B.PARTS_YEAR, NVL(B.ENT_CNT,0) AS ENT_CNT, 0 AS DELV_CNT, '' AS RMK, '' AS OUT_ID, '' AS RECEPT_ID FROM TBEF_ENT A , TBEF_ENT_PARTS B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.ENT_SEQ = B.ENT_SEQ AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.ENT_DT = ? UNION ALL --부품출납일보(출고) SELECT A.DELV_DT AS ENT_DT, B.PARTS_CD, B.PARTS_YEAR, 0 AS ENT_CNT, NVL(B.DELV_CNT,0) AS DELV_CNT, B.RMK, A.OUT_ID, A.RECEPT_ID FROM TBEF_DELV A , TBEF_DELV_PARTS B WHERE A.STND_YEAR = B.STND_YEAR AND A.MBR_CD = B.MBR_CD AND A.DELV_SEQ = B.DELV_SEQ AND A.STND_YEAR = ? AND A.MBR_CD = ? AND A.DELV_DT = ? ) A GROUP BY A.ENT_DT, A.PARTS_CD, A.PARTS_YEAR ) A, ( SELECT PARTS_CD , PARTS_YEAR , SUM(NOW_UNIT_CNT) - SUM(ENT_CNT) + SUM(DELV_CNT) NOW_UNIT_CNT FROM ( SELECT PARTS_CD , PARTS_YEAR , NOW_UNIT_CNT , 0 ENT_CNT , 0 DELV_CNT FROM TBEF_PARTS WHERE STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?, 1, 4) AND MBR_CD = ? UNION ALL SELECT PARTS_CD , PARTS_YEAR , 0 CRFW_UNIT_CNT , ENT_CNT , 0 DELV_CNT FROM TBEF_ENT_PARTS ENT1 , TBEF_ENT ENT2 WHERE ENT2.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?, 1, 4) AND ENT2.ENT_DT > ? AND ENT2.MBR_CD = ? AND ENT1.STND_YEAR = ENT2.STND_YEAR AND ENT1.MBR_CD = ENT2.MBR_CD AND ENT1.ENT_SEQ = ENT2.ENT_SEQ UNION ALL SELECT PARTS_CD , PARTS_YEAR , 0 CRFW_UNIT_CNT , 0 ENT_CNT , DELV_CNT FROM TBEF_DELV_PARTS DELV1 , TBEF_DELV DELV2 WHERE DELV2.STND_YEAR = SUBSTR(?, 1, 4) AND DELV2.DELV_DT > ? AND DELV2.MBR_CD = ? AND DELV1.STND_YEAR = DELV2.STND_YEAR AND DELV1.MBR_CD = DELV2.MBR_CD AND DELV1.DELV_SEQ = DELV2.DELV_SEQ ) GROUP BY PARTS_CD, PARTS_YEAR ) B, TBEF_PARTS_MASTER C WHERE A.PARTS_CD = B.PARTS_CD AND A.PARTS_CD = C.PARTS_CD AND A.PARTS_YEAR = B.PARTS_YEAR AND DECODE(?, 'P', 1, 0) = SIGN(ASCII('W')-ASCII(C.PARTS_TPE)) GROUP BY ROLLUP (C.PARTS_TPE, B.PARTS_CD, B.PARTS_YEAR) ) WHERE (PARTS_YEAR IS NOT NULL OR PARTS_CD IS NULL) --AND DELV_CNT > 0 ORDER BY NVL(GUBUN,'A') DESC, PARTS_CD
